sections.title: Example usage
sections.content:
Display a form for verifying one-time passwords.
Please enter a one-time password from the authenticator app.
examples:
Verify your account Please enter a one-time password from the authenticator app.
Verify Resend code

sections.title: Autosubmit
sections.content:
Use the submit="auto" prop to automatically submit the form once all input fields are filled.
Please enter a one-time password from the authenticator app.
examples: Verify your account Please enter a one-time password from the authenticator app.

sections.title: Alphanumeric
sections.content: Allow non-numeric characters by setting the mode to alphanumeric or alpha.
examples: <flux:otp wire:model="licenseKey" length="10" mode="alphanumeric" label="License key" description:trailing="Enter the license key printed on the installation disc" />

sections.title: Private
sections.content: To mask sensitive input values, use the private prop.

sections.title: Separator
sections.content: Use the default slot to render input fields with a separator in between them.

sections.title: Group
sections.content: Group all input fields together using the flux:otp.group component.

sections.title: Group separator
sections.content: Add a separator between groups of input fields using the flux:otp.separator component.
